thread.title: DRI conducts raids at Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency
thread.title_full: DRI conducts raids at Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency

author: FE Online
title: DRI conducts raids at Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency
text:
DRI conducts raids at Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency DRI conducts raids at Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency Directorate of Revenue Intelligence is conducting raids at the Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency smuggling. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 20, 2017 10:18 AM DRI has conducted raids at Chennai airport to counterfeit fake currency. (Source: PTI) 
Directorate of Revenue Intelligence is conducting raids at the Chennai airport to check counterfeit currency smuggling. These raids are being conducted since Friday morning, according to the TV reports. This step has been taken to stop the inflow of fake currency into the country through Chennai. 
(story under development) Please Wait while comments are loading... Trending Now
